text: == Births == * March 13 – Charles Grey, 2nd Earl Grey, Prime Minister of the United Kingdom (d. 1845) * September 25 – Fletcher Christian, leader of the Mutiny on the Bounty (d. 1793) == Deaths == * April 15 – Madame de Pompadour, mistress of King Louis XV of France (born 1721) * November 20 – Christian Goldbach, Prussian mathematician (born 1690)
